Package com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.policies

KSI signature verification policy

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Policy
    Policy contains the set of rules to be used to verify KSI signature.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalendarBasedVerificationPolicy
    Calendar-based verification takes as input the computed output hash of aggregation hash chains and the `aggregation time'.
    InternalVerificationPolicy
    This policy is used to check keyless signature internal consistency.
    KeyBasedVerificationPolicy
    KSI Signature verification policy.
    PublicationsFileBasedVerificationPolicy
    This rule can be used to verify signatures using publications file.
    UserProvidedPublicationBasedVerificationPolicy
    This policy can be used to verify keyless signatures using used provided publication.

Package com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.policies Description

KSI signature verification policy
